name: Echosystem: Resonance
description:
Echosystem: Resonance

Dive into a story where sound is treated like a life essence that flows through every organism. Your mission is to puzzle through an exciting game world, make use of your senses and your given soundpowers to uncover lost places that has been buried in sound-chaos.

This interactive experience is in an early stage of development and represents the first game project our small team has been working on.

Over the last year we set up different prototypes, which were all based around the idea to develop sound-driven story and game mechanics.

But a few months ago we decided to go separate ways and therefore stop further development.

And instead of forgetting it forever on an external drive, we wanted to put the latest version of Echosystem out there for anybody to try it out.
